means: 放下( down的第三人称单数 )
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 唐斯取自父名，来源于Dunn,含义是“邓恩之子”(son of Dunn)

sentence.Network_en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentence.Network_cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentence.Network_en: Every relationship has a lot of ups and downs.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一段感情都有许多起伏。

sentence.Network_en: Ulverton is a fictional village on the Wessex Downs.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿尔弗顿是一个虚构的地处西撒克斯丘陵的村庄。

PerfectNetExp.abs: downhole turbine motor 井下涡轮电动机downs 粗纺厚呢downshot burner 下射喷燃器

list.abs: 初中英语短语大全 ... 1．near the fireplace 在火炉旁 2．sit down 坐下 3．jump up 跳起来.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... turn sb's blood cold 使毛骨悚然 turn down 关小，调低；拒绝 turn in 转身进入；拐入；交出.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... set back (把钟等)往回拨；推迟 set down 记下；登记；放下 set forth 动身起程.

entry.def: Downs are areas of gentle hills with few trees.

auth_sentence.content: Engineers and geologists in jeans and faded button-downs came.
auth_sentence.res_content: Engineers and geologists in jeans and faded button-downs came.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Engineers and geologists in jeans and faded button-downs came.

auth_sentence.content: But the downs have outnumbered the ups since then.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the downs have outnumbered the ups since then.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the downs have outnumbered the ups since then.

auth_sentence.content: Resorting to arrogance and put-downs is childish at best.
auth_sentence.res_content: Resorting to arrogance and put-downs is childish at best.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Resorting to arrogance and put-downs is childish at best.
